website_summaries.verdict: A value-added accessory for the Wii U that gives the GamePad its own docking station.
pros: Docks Wii U GamePad securely and provides reliable charging
Plugs into Wii U charging port, or any USB port
Bundle includes several cosmetic extras like screen protectors
cons: USB charger cable is problematic and fails frequently

customer_reviews.title: This is what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Exactly what I was needing for my new Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: L. Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Wii U Charge Cables and Cradles!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good and useful but the screen protectors were damaged. The seller was easy to work with and gave a small refund.
customer_reviews.author: The Movie Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and while it included more stuff than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and while it included more stuff than I was looking for - I've used every single part (except screen protectors). Best purchase I've made for the Wii-U. Also, the non-powered dock fits iphone 7 plus really well!
customer_reviews.author: Techguy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: The charging base is definitely the best thing about this pack. The screen protector was a disappointment. This is made for a single product yet I had to cut it to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde Vestrais

customer_reviews.title: Wii u charger
customer_reviews.text: Fourth charger I've bought for my sons Wii u and this one actually works, I'll be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for me granddaughter, she love it. The charging stand works well and takes up very little space on her desk.
customer_reviews.author: AKJones

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied with this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, great value! The charger stand even works with my original charger which stopped working by itself, the extra stand is wonderful for iPads and iPhones too so we use it daily, and the charging cable works perfectly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Virag Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this way of charging the Wii U. We still play some games on it but mainly use it to watch Amazon Prime or Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: missing wii u stand
customer_reviews.text: mine came with out the vertical stand feet for the wii u its self
customer_reviews.author: Hapet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Had everything I needed and more for a great price! Everything was just like what originally comes in the wii u console bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Coral Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap..second time its broke right after the return window closed...dont buy
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Good item. I like that that cord can also be used to charge the pad itself.
customer_reviews.author: Newsons

customer_reviews.title: Cord Issues
customer_reviews.text: We had cord issues from the get go. Sometimes it would charge, others not.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion

customer_reviews.title: A lot for  the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Everything works. Only problem I had is that I have a cover on the pad that I snipped a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: V. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Only had this a few days not sure how long this will last but it works great so far.
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped fast and so far works great. Will see how long it will work, let's just say hope it works for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dowty

customer_reviews.title: Just get a regular charger
customer_reviews.text: What you're paying for with this is basically just the charger with the stands. Just tried to apply the screen protector and it's complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Poe

customer_reviews.title: Good deal if just wanting protectors & dock
customer_reviews.text: Charger cable for dock busted the second day, totally came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Volkmann

customer_reviews.title: PEGLY Usb Charger Kit with Stand for Nintendo Wii U Gamepad 5-in-1 Bundle
customer_reviews.text: Showed up quick and works great. We use the non powered stands for our phones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! I have used these for several months, with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Charger Cable
customer_reviews.text: Got everything nicely packaged, but upon inspection, the charger cable was damaged and un-repairable, however the stand and the screen protector did their job nicely
customer_reviews.author: johnnyv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When my son is happy, I’m happy WE LOVE IT!!! SEMPER-FI!!!
customer_reviews.author: alvin banks

customer_reviews.title: had to return
customer_reviews.text: the charger station worked fine and would have been nice to have, but the 10 ft. charging cable never worked so I had to return it all. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: That everything was great. No worries.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the purchase through the delivery was excellent. Not much more I can say.
customer_reviews.author: MRD1223

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The charger worked for about five days and I ended up just going to the store to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. Works as promised. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: QUICK_THUMBZ

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: My kids needed this charger for their Wii. It was exactly what they needed at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Would buy again , if ever needed
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Dont think it twice , its a must buy and a bargain , very happy with it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Baker

customer_reviews.title: screen protector is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: screen protector is too big and doesnt even fit on the wii u gamepad
customer_reviews.author: J. OASE

customer_reviews.title: Wii U Gamepad
customer_reviews.text: Charge the Wii U pad and came in, in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS
customer_reviews.text: Usb end of charger slid out of the cord and broke the first time we unplugged it from the charger. Sadly this was just a few days past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: ... accessorie pack for my wii u this is a great starter pack
customer_reviews.text: For my first accessorie pack fo my wii u this is a great starter pack! Everything works ! And it's nice that it comes with a screen protector
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.description: pegly usb charger kit with stand for Nintendo Wii u gamepad 5 in 1 bundle with include 10ft usb charging cable, set of charger stand and holder for Wii u gamepad, set of console holder for Wii u console and two pieces top quality screen protector.
